New Records: Parker Meadows hit a grand slam off a 100.7 mph four-seam fastball, which is the second-fastest pitch a Tigers player has homered off of in the pitch-tracking era.
Key Match Events: Parker Meadows hit a game-winning grand slam in the 9th inning.
Post-Match Reflections: Parker Meadows expressed excitement about his game-winning hit.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was a close one with the Padres leading 3-0 before the Tigers' comeback.
Others: The Tigers' win stopped the Padres' three-game winning streak.
